campaignPerformance.name: [February 3] [Search] [Search Partners] [AI MAX] Tree Removal
campaignPerformance.verdict: Losing money — restructure or reduce spend

keyInsights.insight: 1 campaign(s) losing ~$97/month: [February 3] [Search] [Search Partners] [AI MAX] Tree Removal (0.48x ROAS on $186).
$69 spent on 8 zero-conversion search terms (100% of visible spend).
2 low-QS keywords costing ~$55/month in CPC premiums.
Only 15% Search Impression Share — missing 85% of eligible searches.

checks.name: Conversion actions defined
checks.finding: 23 conversion actions (7x PHONE_CALL_LEAD, 9x CONTACT, 2x GET_DIRECTIONS, 1x PAGE_VIEW, 1x ENGAGEMENT, 2x SUBMIT_LEAD_FORM, 1x DEFAULT). Recording 3 conversions in 30d.

checks.name: Enhanced conversions
checks.finding: Not enabled. With 3 conversions/month, every lost signal degrades bidding. Enable in Goals > Conversions > Settings.

checks.name: Server-side tracking
checks.finding: No server-side tracking. Browser-based tracking misses 10-25% of conversions. Implement server-side GTM or API conversion imports.

checks.name: Conversion categories
checks.finding: 7 conversion categories: 7x PHONE_CALL_LEAD, 9x CONTACT, 2x GET_DIRECTIONS, 1x PAGE_VIEW, 1x ENGAGEMENT, 2x SUBMIT_LEAD_FORM, 1x DEFAULT.

checks.name: Micro vs macro separation
checks.finding: 0 primary actions, all macro conversions. Smart Bidding is optimizing for real business outcomes.

checks.name: No duplicate counting
checks.finding: Potential duplicates: 9x "call" actions; 3x "form" actions. Duplicates inflate counts 2-3x and cause Smart Bidding to overbid.

checks.name: GA4 linked
checks.finding: GA4 conversion actions linked — enables cross-device tracking and richer audience data.

checks.name: Tags firing
checks.finding: 23 actions recording 3 conversions in 30d. Data is flowing.

checks.name: Search term waste
checks.finding: $69 spent on 8 zero-conversion search terms (100% of $69 visible search spend). Top waste: "arborist" $30, "tree removals" $10, "arborist toowoomba" $8, "ata tree services" $8, "hedge trimming services brisbane" $7.

checks.name: Negative keyword lists
checks.finding: 1 list(s) with 95 total negatives. Add themed lists (Competitors, Job Seekers, Irrelevant) — minimum 3 for proper filtering.

checks.name: Account-level negatives
checks.finding: 95 negative keywords across 1 lists. Ensure lists are attached to all active campaigns.

checks.name: Broad match performance
checks.finding: Broad match: $186 spend, 3 conv, $62 CPA. Exact: $0 spend, 0 conv.

checks.name: Zero-conversion keywords
checks.finding: 2 keywords spent $56 with 0 conversions in 30d. Top waste: "tree removal brisbane" $48, "tree fellas" $8.

checks.name: Campaign naming
checks.finding: 2 naming prefix(es) across 2 campaigns. Consistent naming convention.

checks.name: Ad group structure
checks.finding: 2 ad groups across 2 campaigns (avg 1/campaign).

checks.name: Single theme ad groups
checks.finding: 1 ad groups per campaign on average. Manageable structure.

checks.name: Campaign count
checks.finding: 2 campaigns: 2 SEARCH.

checks.name: Brand campaign
checks.finding: No brand campaign. Competitors can bid on your brand name. Create one immediately — brand campaigns typically achieve 30-50x ROAS.

checks.name: PMax campaign
checks.finding: No active PMax. Consider launching with strong asset groups and audience signals.

checks.name: Search + PMax overlap
checks.finding: No concurrent Search + PMax.

checks.name: Budget allocation
checks.finding: 2 campaigns, $45/day budget, 15% Search Impression Share. Worst: [February 3] [Search] [Search Partners] [AI MAX] Tree Removal (0.48x ROAS, $186). $186/month on below-1x-ROAS or zero-conversion campaigns.

checks.name: Budget utilization
checks.finding: $45/day budget, ~$6/day actual spend (14% utilization). Under-delivery — check targeting, bids, or Quality Score.

checks.name: Geographic targeting
checks.finding: "Presence or Interest" geo targeting active — shows ads to people merely interested in your location, not physically there. Switch to "Presence" in Settings > Locations.

checks.name: Network settings
checks.finding: Search campaigns properly isolated from Display Network.

checks.name: Quality Score
checks.finding: Avg QS: 2.4/10 across 5 scored keywords (0 at 7+, 5 below 5). Est. CPC premium from low-QS keywords: ~$55/month. Top offenders: "tree services near me" QS 2 ($99 spend, ~$48 premium), "tree removal brisbane" QS 4 ($48 spend, ~$8 premium).

checks.name: Zero-impression keywords
checks.finding: 2873 of 3379 enabled keywords had 0 impressions in 30d. These are too restrictive, low-volume, or outranked — review and pause dead keywords.

checks.name: Keyword-to-ad relevance
checks.finding: Avg QS 2.4 indicates poor keyword-to-ad relevance. Tighten ad group themes and include keywords in headlines.

checks.name: RSA Ad Strength
checks.finding: No RSAs found. Every search ad group needs at least 1 RSA.

checks.name: PMax performance
checks.finding: No active PMax campaigns.

checks.name: CTR vs benchmark
checks.finding: Account CTR: 1.71%. Below minimum threshold — review ad copy relevance and keyword targeting.

checks.name: Smart bidding
checks.finding: Smart bidding active: MAXIMIZE_CONVERSIONS.

checks.name: Search impression share
checks.finding: 15% Search Impression Share — missing 85% of eligible searches. Increase budget on profitable campaigns or improve QS.

checks.name: Manual CPC justification
checks.finding: Using automated bidding.

checks.name: Sitelinks
checks.finding: 143 sitelink asset(s) configured.

checks.name: Callouts
checks.finding: 16 callout asset(s) configured.

checks.name: Structured snippets
checks.finding: 8 structured_snippet asset(s) configured.

checks.name: Image extensions
checks.finding: 228 image asset(s) configured.

checks.name: Call extensions
checks.finding: 11 call asset(s) configured.

checks.name: Remarketing audiences
checks.finding: 6 remarketing/audience list(s) configured.

checks.name: Customer Match
checks.finding: No Customer Match lists. Upload CRM emails/phones for lookalike targeting and customer exclusion.

quickWins.action: Pause or restructure "[February 3] [Search] [Search Partners] [AI MAX] Tree Removal" — 0.48x ROAS on $186, losing ~$97/month.
Add negatives for 8 zero-conversion search terms: "arborist", "tree removals", "arborist toowoomba"... — $69 wasted.
Pause 2 zero-conversion keywords: "tree removal brisbane", "tree fellas" — $56 wasted.
Improve 2 keywords with QS below 5 — est. $55/month CPC premium. Worst: "tree services near me" QS 2.
Fix: Enhanced conversions — Not enabled. With 3 conversions/month, every lost signal degrades bidding. Enable in Goals > Conversions > Settings.
Fix: Server-side tracking — No server-side tracking. Browser-based tracking misses 10-25% of conversions. Implement server-side GTM or API conversion imports.
Fix: No duplicate counting — Potential duplicates: 9x "call" actions; 3x "form" actions. Duplicates inflate counts 2-3x and cause Smart Bidding to overbid.

items: 1 campaign(s) are losing money ($97/month): [February 3] [Search] [Search Partners] [AI MAX] Tree Removal (0.48x ROAS, $186). Restructure keywords/targeting or reduce budget.
Create a brand Search campaign to protect branded terms from competitors.
Build remarketing audiences (all visitors 30d, cart abandoners, converters) and upload Customer Match lists from CRM.
Increase Search Impression Share from 15% — you're missing 85% of potential customers.
